definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: draw out, extract (si vera l.; =[[שָׁלַל]]; Syr. 4lo0 (e.g. Ex 2:10), Targum:Jer [[שְׁלִי]] (e.g.Le 11:17));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3ms. apoc. (Ges § 109 k) [[כִי וֵ֫שֶׁל אֱלוֹהַּ נַפְשׁוֹ]] Job 27:8 (De); < read [[יׇשׁׂל]], or [[יִשּׁל]] (√ llv) Di; Schnurrer We Siegf Bu Du [[יִשְׁאַל]] demandeth; Perles:Anal. 48 [[יִשָּׂא אֶל־אֱלוֹהַּ]].
